skills.name: Flamboyant Gore
skills.desc: Uses this ability immediately when there are 2 Lavish Fruits on the field. Deals Lightning DMG to all targets. Deals more damage for every "Ambrosial Arbor Branches" on the field. After the ability is used, remove all "Ambrosial Arbor Branches" on the field.

skills.name: Pedicel: Wintry Wind
skills.desc: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Wintry Wind"

skills.name: Pedicel: Marple Leaf
skills.desc: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Marple Leaf"

skills.name: Pedicel: Glorious Blooms
skills.desc: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Glorious Blooms"

skills.name: Pedicel: Lavish Fruits
skills.desc: Summons Ambrosial Arbor branch "Twig of Lavish Fruits"

skills.name: Wavering Bleat
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Caress of Wind
skills.desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Hardy Leaf Sheath
skills.desc: Increases DEF. Toughness cannot be reduced.
